description: Fujiwara Takumi is the main character in Initial D. Takumi has been driving up and down Akina mountain using a panda coloured Toyota Corolla Sprinter Trueno (AE86) since the age of 12, doing deliveries for his father`s tofu shop. Because of this, he has became a very skilled driver and after overtaking http://anidb.net/ch9257 [Takahashi Keisuke] he is thrown into the world of mountain pass racing.
name: Fujiwara Takumi
